meanings.definition: Demonstrate the truth or existence of something by evidence or argument.
meanings.sent1: She was proving her point with clear facts.
meanings.sent2: The scientist was proving his theory through experiments.
meanings.sent3: The detective was proving his skills by solving the case.
meanings.sent4: The sun proving its strength by shining brightly.
meanings.sent5: The student was proving her knowledge in the exam.

meanings.definition: Show oneself to be competent or capable.
meanings.sent1: He was proving himself by completing the task successfully.
meanings.sent2: The athlete was proving her abilities in the competition.
meanings.sent3: The chef was proving his talent by cooking a delicious meal.
meanings.sent4: The flower proving its beauty by blooming in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The child was proving his bravery by facing his fears.
